price: ئەنە شۇلارنى ئاللاھ ئەپۇ قىلغاي. ئاللاھ ناھايىتى ئەپۇ قىلغۇچىدۇر، ناھايىتى مەغپىرەت قىلغۇچىدۇر[99].
arabic: فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ عَسَى ٱللَّهُ أَن يَعۡفُوَ عَنۡهُمۡۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ عَفُوًّا غَفُورٗا

version.title: Uyghur translation - Sh. Muhammad Saleh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Uyghur by Sh. Muhammad Saleh. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: fa-ulāika ʿasā al-lahu an yaʿfuwa ʿanhum wakāna al-lahu ʿafuwwan ghafūran
